dcterms:description: A multi-modal database for pulse estimation from less-constrained face video, containing 2,378 visible light videos and 752 near-infrared videos of 107 subjects, with variations in head movements, illumination, and acquisition devices.
dcterms:title: VIPL-HR

dcterms:description: A multimodal database for affect recognition and implicit tagging, consisting of videos recorded under controlled conditions with variations in facial expressions.
dcterms:title: MAHNOB-HCI

dcterms:description: A dataset for heart rate estimation from face videos under realistic conditions, focusing on self-adaptive matrix completion techniques.
dcterms:title: MMSE-HR

dcterms:description: A database for non-contact video-based pulse rate measurement, consisting of videos of subjects performing various movements.
dcterms:title: PURE

dcterms:description: A dataset for pulse estimation using deep learning with time-frequency representation, consisting of videos of subjects under controlled conditions.

dcterms:description: A large face video database for remote physiological signal measurement and atrial fibrillation detection, consisting of videos recorded under various conditions.
